description: Introducing the Butter Chicken - a delicious and flavorful dish made with tender chicken cooked in a rich and creamy tomato-based sauce. It is seasoned with a blend of aromatic spices and served with fragrant basmati rice. Indulge in this classic Indian dish that is sure to satisfy your taste buds.

cheese.description: Parmesan Reggiano is a hard, dry, fruity, and nutty-flavored cheese made from raw skimmed milk of cows. It is commonly used as a grating cheese.
cheese.name: Parmesan Reggiano

cheese.description: Feta is a brined cheese produced with unpasteurized or pasteurized milk. It has a tangy flavor and crumbly texture, often used in salads and Greek cuisine.
cheese.name: Feta

herbs.description: This fragrant Georgian spice is mixed with fenugreek, marigold petals, coriander, black pepper, dill, mint, and bay leaf. It has warm, bitter, nutty, and grassy flavors.
herbs.name: Khmeli Suneli

herbs.description: Basil is a versatile herb that goes well with baked fish, tomatoes, and tomato salads. It adds freshness and flavor to dishes.
herbs.name: Basil

spices.description: Pimentón de la Vera is a smoked paprika made by crushing dried peppers into a fragrant and smoky powder. It adds a unique flavor to various dishes.
spices.name: Pimentón de la Vera

name: Butter Chicken

customerReviews.name: John Smith
customerReviews.review: Absolutely delicious! The perfect balance of flavors. The chicken was tender, and the spiciness was just right.

customerReviews.name: Emily Johnson
customerReviews.review: I enjoyed the dish, especially the aromatic basil. It had a good level of spiciness, and the chicken was cooked well.

customerReviews.name: Michael Davis
customerReviews.review: Great dish! The flavors were authentic, and the portion size was generous. Will definitely order again.

customerReviews.name: Sarah Thompson
customerReviews.review: The dish had good flavor, but it was slightly too spicy for my taste. The chicken could have been more tender.

customerReviews.name: David Wilson
customerReviews.review: This dish was outstanding! The flavors were bold and well-balanced. Definitely a must-try.

salesAndOffers.title: Happy Hour Special

salesAndOffers.title: Family Special

beverages.description: A refreshing citrus drink made with freshly squeezed lemons and a hint of sweetness. Perfect for quenching your thirst.
beverages.name: Lemonade

beverages.description: A classic chilled tea beverage infused with flavors like lemon, peach, or mint. It provides a cool and soothing sensation.
beverages.name: Iced Tea

beverages.description: Bubbly and effervescent, sparkling water provides a crisp and clean taste that pairs well with any meal. A refreshing choice.
beverages.name: Sparkling Water

foodDrinks.description: A comforting and warm liquid dish made with a variety of ingredients like vegetables, meat, or seafood. Perfect as a starter or light meal.
foodDrinks.name: Soup

foodDrinks.description: A creamy and blended beverage made with fruits, yogurt, and sometimes additional ingredients like spinach or protein powder. Offers a nutritious and refreshing option.
foodDrinks.name: Smoothie

foodDrinks.description: A non-alcoholic cocktail that combines various fruit juices, sodas, and garnishes to create a flavorful and visually appealing drink. Perfect for those who prefer alcohol-free options.
foodDrinks.name: Mocktail
